header.subtext: Tailored services to help you grow in the region
header.title: On-the-ground Support

support.title: Support Services
support.subtext: A complete range of support services across producing and buying countries
support.content:
Choose from a menu of services according to your needs: 

* Factory Compliance
* Product Development & Sampling
* Raw Material Monitoring
* Order Follow-Up
* Quality Assurance
* Logistics Assistance

We have a network of Country Representatives offering production support services in the main producing countries and customer-facing support in the principal Buying markets:

**Producing Countries**                                                                 

**Mauritius, Madagascar, South Africa, Swaziland, Lesotho, Botswana, Tanzania, Ethiopia, , Morocco, Tunisia, Kenya, Uganda**
Coming Soon: Egypt                                                                             

**Buying Markets**

**USA, Italy, Germany, Austria, Switzerland, Belgium, Netherlands, Luxembourg, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Baltic Countries, Poland, Ukraine, Russia, South Africa, Reunion**
Coming Soon: France, Portugal

virtual.title: Virtual Factory
virtual.subtext: ABANA acts as your supplier providing  an end-to end sourcing solution accessing a network of specialized factories
virtual.content:
* Access a network of proven factories with a complete service including sample development, merchandising, quality assurance & logistics support
* Financing of raw materials

advisory.title: Advisory
advisory.subtext: Tap into our experience for custom advice on how to grow your regional business
advisory.content: * Strategic advice on finding the optimal sourcing-solutions in the Indian Ocean
